content: rights reserved this pattern is for personal use only the pattern or parts of it may not be reproduced distributed or resold translated published altered shared or posted for sale or for free over the internet or offline you may sell items made from this pattern but please do not claim this pattern as your own if you wish to share this pattern you may link to it but please do not reprint it on your site round 8 colour c pay attention to this round you will start squaring out and therefore in every other set of leaves you make double_crochet s and in the next half_double_crochet s repeatedly start around any ch2-space * 1 double_crochet + ch1 x 3 times + 1 double_crochet 1 fphdc around the dc3bobble 3 single_crochet around the ch4 1 slip_stitch in the back strands of the picot 3 single_crochet on the other side of the picot but around the same ch4 1 fphdc 1 half_double_crochet + ch1 x 3 times + 1 half_double_crochet 1 fphdc around the dc3bobble 3 single_crochet around the ch4 1 slip_stitch in the back strands of the picot 3 single_crochet on the other side of the picot but around the same ch4 1 fphdc* x 4 times fasten_off and weave in your ends stitch count 16 double_crochet 16 half_double_crochet 16 fphdc 24 ch1 8 slip_stitch 48 single_crochet round 9 colour d start around any first ch1 of any petal with double_crochet s *2 half_double_crochet in the ch1 skip 1 st 2 half_double_crochet + ch2 2 half_double_crochet in the middle ch1 skip 1 st 2 half_double_crochet in the next ch1 1 fpdc around the fphdc ch4 and skip 7 sts 1 fphdc around the fphdc skip 1 2 single_crochet in the ch1 x 3 times 1 fphdc around the fp half_double_crochet ch4 and skip 7 sts 1 fpdc around the fphdc skip 1 *x 4 times fasten_off and weave in your ends stitch count per side 8 half_double_crochet 1 ch2 2 ch4 6 single_crochet 2 fpdc 2 fphdc © 2023 krokoklint design made by lina kittel all rights reserved this pattern is for personal use only the pattern or parts of it may not be reproduced distributed or resold translated published altered shared or posted for sale or for free over the internet or offline you may sell items made from this pattern but please do not claim this pattern as your own if you wish to share this pattern you may link to it but please do not reprint it on your site round 10 colour d start in any ch2-corner * 2 single_crochet + ch1 + 2 single_crochet skip 1 hidden st single_crochet in the next 3 skip 1 st make 6 single_crochet around the ch4-space skip 1 1 single_crochet in the next 6 single_crochet skip 1 6 single_crochet around the ch4-space skip 2 1 single_crochet in the next 3 sts* x 4 times fasten_off and weave in your ends stitch count per side 28 single_crochet 1 ch1
